summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating the use and occupancy of buildings, amending Sections 403, 405, 407, 408, 409, 414, 415, 416, 417, 420, 801 through 809, 901, 902, 904 through 908, 1101, 1301 through 1308, and 1401 through 1408 of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500) and adding thereto new sections designated Sections 810, 811, 909, 1309 through 1312, and 1409 through 1411.
